name: Zen Build
description:
How to play:
Left mouse button (click) to select a puzzle piece.
Left mouse button (click) to select a target for the selected piece.
Left mouse button (double click) to deselect the selection.
Mouse scroll to zoom.
Left mouse button (hold) to rotate camera around.

Info:
Model expansions will be considered in the future. You can vote online to choose the next expansion theme: http://www.easypolls.net/poll.html?p=545cf6a9e4b0...

If you like this game and want to show appreciation all you need to do is demonstrate this game to people you think might like it.

For more information: https://twitter.com/grigtod
